        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        In main goes declarations of function.There also is initialized new Scanner Object for scanning Input Stream from keyboard.

      • arrayPrint

        public static void arrayPrint(int[] arr,
              int len)
        Dedicated for printiing an array in case that array is not null.In id is made a cicle For for printing each item of vector .
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that need to be inputed in functionarrayPrint.
        len - Length of array that is called by function.
        i - In cicle For it is a counter set on 0 and incremented on each interation.

      • swapFunction

        public static void swapFunction(int[] arr,
                int iIndex,
                int jIndex)
        Traditional funciton of swaping two elements in an array. Function swapFucntion is based on simple principle.Is declared a temporary variable
        .
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that is called by function.
        iIndex - Index for first element to be swapped.
        jIndex - Index for second element to be swapped.
        temp - temporary variable that will substitute one of 2 variabiles.

      • moveBackPos

        public static void moveBackPos(int[] arr,
               int go,
               int len)
        Function for mooving back position to the last state of array if in calling of one permutationFucntion , arrengementFunction or combinationFunction i >= start is false. In functio we create a temporary variable tmp where we put the go element. In for , on i = go up to len - 1 , we copy in current array next element , in final we return back tmp element.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that is inputed by user
        go - Element from where need to moove to the last array state
        len - Length of array that is called by function.

      • permutationFunction

        public static void permutationFunction(int[] arr,
                       int start,
                       int len)
        Permute an array and print it.It is started with a print of array (made as a function) then goes a check of logical sentence if (start<len). In 2 For's is ruled swapFunction and permutationFunction at the end fisrt cicle we moveback state of array.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that is called by function and introduced by user.
        start - Is a counter from where function need to start to make permutations.
        len - Length of array that is called by function.

      • arrangementFunction

        public static void arrangementFunction(int[] arr,
                       int start,
                       int len,
                       int combs)
        Also as arrangementFunctionis started with a print of array (made as a function) then goes a check of logical sentence if (start<len), but as len we use variable combs.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that is called by function and introduced by user.
        start - Is a counter from where function need to start to make arrangements.
        len - Length of array that is called by function.
        combs - Number of elements to arrange.

      • combinationFunction

        public static void combinationFunction(int[] arr,
                       int start,
                       int len,
                       int combs)
        Also as arrangementFunctionis started with a print of array in function arrayPrint().Thefore goes 2 For's in where will be applied recursive call of this function.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array that is called by function and introduced by user.
        start - Is a counter from where function need to start to make arrangements.
        len - Length of array that is called by function.
        combs - Number of elements to arrange.
